File libsrc/libgobject/Periods.c

The Periods class is used to associate objects with different time periods. The class struture is defined as 
  typedef struct
  {
 	GObjectPart		core;
 
 	int			numPeriods;
 	double			*tbeg;
 	double			*tend;
 	Vector			v;
  } Periods;

See Also:
new_Vector

Public Function Index

new_Periods ()
Create an Periods object.
Periods_add (Periods, double, double, GObject)
Add a time period.
Periods_get (Periods, double)
Get the Periods object for an input time.

Create an Periods object.

                  double tbeg,
                  double tend,
                  GObject o)
Add a time period.

Get the Periods object for an input time.
